languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс делает заметку на инфопластине.{/n} "Есть более убедительные способы выгородить себя, чем выдумывать таинственного блюстителя, похищающего пропуски. Стоит запомнить этот инцидент, он может быть связан с делом".

{n}Heinrix makes a note on his data-slate.{/n} "There are more convincing ways of exculpating oneself than making up some mysterious enforcer stealing passes. This incident should not be forgotten — it might be connected to the case."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс делает заметку на инфопластине.{/n} "Есть более убедительные способы выгородить себя, чем выдумывать таинственного блюстителя, похищающего пропуски. Стоит запомнить этот инцидент, он может быть связан с делом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix makes a note on his data-slate.{/n} "There are more convincing ways of exculpating oneself than making up some mysterious enforcer stealing passes. This incident should not be forgotten — it might be connected to the case."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix toma apuntes en su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Hay formas más convincentes de echar balones fuera que inventarse que hay un agente misterioso que roba pases. Tengamos este incidente en cuenta: podría tener relación con el caso que nos ocupa».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a note on his data-slate.{/n} "There are more convincing ways of exculpating oneself than making up some mysterious enforcer stealing passes. This incident should not be forgotten — it might be connected to the case."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix toma apuntes en su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Hay formas más convincentes de echar balones fuera que inventarse que hay un agente misterioso que ropa pases. Tengamos este incidente en cuenta: podría tener relación con el caso que nos ocupa».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはデータスレートにメモを取った。{/n} 「パスを盗んだ謎のエンフォーサーをでっち上げるより、もっと説得力のある弁解の方法があります。この事件を忘れてはなりません」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a note on his data-slate.{/n} "There are more convincing ways of exculpating oneself than making up some mysterious enforcer stealing passes. This incident should not be forgotten — it might be connected to the case."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはデータスレートにメモを取った。{/n} 「パスを盗んだ謎のエンフォーサーをでっち上げるより、もっと説得力のある弁解の方法があります。この事件を忘れてはなりません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希在数据板上记着笔记。{/n}“如果这个人打算为自己开脱，那他没必要编造某个身份不明的执法者拿走通行证的故事，有很多比这更合适的借口。这个细节不容忽视，很可能和案情本身有关。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a note on his data-slate.{/n} "There are more convincing ways of exculpating oneself than making up some mysterious enforcer stealing passes. This incident should not be forgotten — it might be connected to the case."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希在数据板上记着笔记。{/n}“如果这个人打算为自己开脱，那他没必要编造某个身份不明的执法者拿走通行证的故事，有很多比这更合适的借口。这个细节不容忽视，很可能和案情本身有关。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix notiert etwas auf seinem Datablock.{/n} "Es gibt überzeugendere Wege, sich zu rechtfertigen, als sich irgendwelche Enforcer auszudenken, die angeblich Pässe stehlen. Dieser Zwischenfall sollte nicht vergessen werden ... er könnte mit dem Fall in Verbindung stehen.
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a note on his data-slate.{/n} "There are more convincing ways of exculpating oneself than making up some mysterious enforcer stealing passes. This incident should not be forgotten — it might be connected to the case."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix notiert etwas auf seinem Datablock.{/n} "Es gibt überzeugendere Wege, sich zu rechtfertigen, als sich irgendwelche Enforcer auszudenken, die angeblich Pässe stehlen. Dieser Zwischenfall sollte nicht vergessen werden ... er könnte mit dem Fall in Verbindung stehen.
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix prend note sur sa plaque de données.{/n} « Il y a plus convaincant pour se disculper que d'inventer un prévôt mystérieux qui vole des laissez-passer… Nous devrions garder cet incident en tête. Il pourrait être lié à l'affaire qui nous intéresse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a note on his data-slate.{/n} "There are more convincing ways of exculpating oneself than making up some mysterious enforcer stealing passes. This incident should not be forgotten — it might be connected to the case."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix prend note sur sa plaque de données.{/n} « Il y a plus convaincant pour se disculper que d'inventer un prévôt mystérieux qui vole des laissez-passer… Nous devrions garder cet incident en tête. Il pourrait être lié à l'affaire qui nous intéresse. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, databelasına not düşüyor.{/n} "Kendini aklamak için gizemli bir infazcının giriş kartını çaldığını uydurmaktan daha inandırıcı yollar mevcut. Bu hadisenin unutulmaması gerek. Davayla alakalı olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a note on his data-slate.{/n} "There are more convincing ways of exculpating oneself than making up some mysterious enforcer stealing passes. This incident should not be forgotten — it might be connected to the case."
